name: Random love notes
func:
var line1 = ["Heya sexxy, ", "Oh wow, ", "Barbie doll, ", "howdy-do, "]
var line2 = [
        "Your stud muffin ", "your Lover ", "Your sexxy guy ", "That guy ", "Mr wonderful "
        ]
var line3 = [
        "wanted you to know  ",
        "Asked me to tell you  ",
        "Told me to pass along to you  ",
        "Ordered me to tell you  ",
        "Shared with me  "
        ]
var line4 = [
        "that he loves you, ", "that he has the hots for you, ", " that He only has eyes for you, ", " that You are a sexxy woman , "
        ]
var line5 = [
        "Enjoy the show.", "Have fun with netflix and chill.", "Dont forget to brush your teeth.", "I know, I am annoying "
        ]

msg.payload =

line1[Math.floor(Math.random() * line1.length)]+
line2[Math.floor(Math.random() * line2.length)]+
line3[Math.floor(Math.random() * line3.length)]+
line4[Math.floor(Math.random() * line4.length)]+
line5[Math.floor(Math.random() * line5.length)]

return msg

func:
msg.payload =

"Good night Barbara your phone is "+
"{{states.sensor.sm_g973u_battery_state.state}}"+ ", " +

"The battery is "+
"{{states.sensor.sm_g973u_battery_level.state}} percent"+ ", " +

"front of house lights are "+
"{{states.group.front_of_house.state}} "+ ", " +

"Out side temp is "+
"{{states.sensor.patioth_am2301_temperature.state}} Degrees"+ ", " +

"pellets in stove is at "+
"{{states.sensor.pellet_level_in_percent.state}} percent"+ ", " +

"tomorrows weather will be "+

"chance of thunder storm "+
"{{states.sensor.barb_s_place_thunderstorm_probability_day_1d.state}}Percent "+ ", " +

"have a good night, sleep well "
